text: Dimaadua e helekai gi Israel, “Di maluagina o Egypt mo Ethiopia gaa hai nia mee ni aau, mono daane llauehaa o Seba gaa hai digau hai hegau ni aau. Digaula ga daudali goe i di nadau lawalawa gi nadau daula baalanga, gaa pala gi lala adu gi di goe, ga helekai boloo, ‘God le e madalia goe, go Mee modogo Ia dela go di God.
